alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Stark; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Ashland, southern Stark, southern Wayne and northern Holmes Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Loudonville to Holmesville to near Dover. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, Wooster, Massillon, Minerva, Loudonville, Brewster, Navarre, Dalton, Shreve, Waynesburg, East Sparta, Holmesville, Wilmot, Mount Eaton, Winesburg, East Canton, Apple Creek, Beach City, Perrysville and Meyers Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
